name: Chicken Kabob
description:
Colorful Chickens seek to become one kabob by helping each other!

Playing Chicken Kabob

Controls:
    A        Move the current stack of chickens left
    D        Move the current stack of chickens right
    TAB        Switch Between stacks of chickens
            You can see what stack of chickens you currently control by looking for the shadow underneath it. You can only control one stack at a time.

    Space        Jump
    F1        Sacrifice a stack of chickens
    F2        Restart a level
    F10        Quit to main menu while in a level
    Alt + F4    Quit to desktop at any time

Playing:
    You control different stacks of chickens in a kitchen themed world.
    Your goal is to create the biggest Chicken Kabob by getting all the chickens to the skewer at the end.
    Each level is completed after getting all chickens to the end of the level.
    If you get none of the chickens to the skewer you will lose and have the option to restart the level or quit to the home screen.
    If you get at least one but not all chickens you still lose the level but also have the option to skip the level to see what the other levels are like.
    If you get all of the chickens to the skewer you win that level and are able to continue.

    In menus you use the mouse to select the option you want by left clicking on it.

    There are multiple obstacles;
        Spikes
        Pits
        Fire
        Doors
        Switches (that open the doors)
    Springs

There is also a visual HowToPlay in the game.
